channel.title: Word Online - Create Powerful Documents & Save them from your browser!
channel.description:
Okay, this is my first free web software, please don't be too harsh. [b]Description:[/b] Don't have microsoft word at home? Want to access your documents from anywhere, without a USB pen? Want to do it free of charge, and without registering?
Try it out: http://www.wordonline.host22.com/
Or try out the loading document method: http://www.wordonline.host22.com/file-storage.php ID: [b]49[/b] Password: [b]moparscape[/b]
[b]New Feature:[/b] Dynamic File Loading (load your document directly from a link) http://www.wordonline.host22.com/dynamic-load.php?id=60&pass=test-password Previous example: http://www.wordonline.host22.com/dynamic-load.php?id=49&pass=moparscape
Please tell me what you think, I added a few games there, and before you ask, its not copyright, its just a wysiwyg html editor with a ms office look :D
[u][b]Please leave feedback...[/b][/u] [u][b] Credits:[/b][/u] 20% Metamorphozis.com - Template 60% imjohn10 - Finding bugs + hacks 20% tobias222 - Everything else
